reviewText: I made one of these and like the dvd too...
Sharon Pederson is a master at combining color, design, & technique to make the skill of reversible quilting fun to learn.
Excellent instructions.  I have referred to this book and dvd and used the information for over a dozen quilts that I have made.

After having met Sharon on a tour to China, where she showed us how she makes her reversible quilts, I wanted her right next to me when I did my projects. A great video, full of neat little tips, and clearly explains the process. However, it is a help to have the books as a reference.

Sharon Pederson is an excellent teacher. Her teaching is through and the video work excellent, easily & clearly keeping up with her teaching.  She is easy to understand & follow, even for a newbe like me.  I can now do this.  This gracious teacher is worth the price of the DVD and then some!!! You'll be glad you bought it.
